messages.subject: Re: Gempei War and especially the Taira and women samurai

messages.messageBody:
I am interested in Gempei War and especially the Taira and women samurai.
Aside from Tomoe Gozen I have not read about other women samurai (although I
am writing about a fictional one).

References? Sources? I welcome legitimate historical research. Thanks!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
